hibernate-mapping.sql-query: Select a.device_id as {serialost.deviceId},sum(a.serial_no) as {serialost.truth}, (((max(a.serial_no)+min(a.serial_no))*(max(a.serial_no)-min(a.serial_no)+1))/2) as {serialost.logic}, count(a.serial_no) as {serialost.countserial}, (max(a.serial_no)-min(a.serial_no)+1) as {serialost.logicserial}, ((max(a.serial_no)-min(a.serial_no)+1)-count(a.serial_no)) as {serialost.diff} from YKT_CUR.T_TIF_RCVDTL as a, ykt_cur.T_PIF_DEVICE as b where concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time)>=:startTime AND not concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time)>:endTime and (a.tx_date=:dateTime or a.tx_date=:dateTime1) and a.device_id=b.dev999_id and not b.state_id = 5 and not concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time)>a.col_timestamp group by a.device_id having not(sum(a.serial_no)=(((max(a.serial_no)+min(a.serial_no))*(max(a.serial_no)-min(a.serial_no)+1))/2)) and not(max(double(a.serial_no))> 65535) and ((max(a.serial_no)-min(a.serial_no)+1)-count(a.serial_no))>0 order by {serialost.diff}

Select a.device_id as deviceId from YKT_CUR.T_TIF_RCVDTL as a, ykt_cur.T_PIF_DEVICE as b where concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time)>=:startTime and not concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time)>:endTime and (a.tx_date=:dateTime or a.tx_date=:dateTime1) and a.device_id=b.dev999_id and not b.state_id = 5 group by a.device_id having max(a.serial_no)=65535

select a.serial_no as serialNo from YKT_CUR.T_TIF_RCVDTL as a where concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time)>:startTime and not concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time)>:endTime and (a.tx_date=:dateTime or a.tx_date=:dateTime1) and a.device_id=:deviceId order by a.serial_no

select concat(tx_date,tx_time)as dateTime from YKT_CUR.T_TIF_RCVDTL where concat(tx_date,tx_time)>=:startTime and not concat(tx_date,tx_time)>:endTime and device_id=:deviceId and (tx_date=:dateTime or tx_date=:dateTime1) and serial_no=65535

select {rcvdtl.*} from YKT_CUR.T_TIF_RCVDTL as rcvdtl,YKT_CUR.V_BLKLST as b where rcvdtl.card_no=b.card_id and rcvdtl.tx_mark=153 and concat(rcvdtl.tx_date,rcvdtl.tx_time)>concat('20',b.volume) and b.is_ad=0 and rcvdtl.col_timestamp>:startTime and not rcvdtl.col_timestamp>:endTime
select b.card_id as cardId from YKT_CUR.V_BLKLST as b where b.is_ad=1 and b.card_id=:cardId and not concat('20',b.volume)>:txTime
select b.card_id as cardId from YKT_CUR.V_BLKLST as b where b.is_ad=0 and card_id=:cardId and not concat('20',b.volume)>:txTime

select a.card_no as cardNo from ykt_cur.t_tif_rcvdtl a where (a.tx_date=:txDate or a.tx_date=:txDate1) and not a.tx_time>:txTime and a.tx_time>:txTime1 group by a.card_no having count(a.serial_no)>:countLimit
select a.card_no as cardNo from ykt_cur.t_tif_rcvdtl a where not concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time)>:txTime and concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time)>:txTime1 group by a.card_no having count(a.serial_no)>:countLimit

select {a.*} from YKT_CUR.T_TIF_RCVDTL a,YKT_CUR.T_TIF_RCVDTL b where a.total_cnt=b.total_cnt-1 and a.card_no=b.card_no and a.col_timestamp>:startTime and not a.col_timestamp>:endTime and b.col_timestamp>:startTime and not b.col_timestamp>:endTime and a.tx_mark=153 and b.tx_mark=153 and not a.out_bala=b.in_bala order by a.card_no,a.total_cnt
select a.device_id as deviceId from YKT_CUR.T_TIF_RCVDTL a where a.col_timestamp>:startTime and not a.col_timestamp>:endTime group by a.device_id having not max(concat(a.tx_date,a.tx_time))>:time
